This parameter must be provided on \"TRC_0000\" format, see the example. N - Normal or S - Simple","enum":["S","N"],"type":"string"},"referenceNumber":{"format":"int64","description":"Reference number","type":"integer"},"dueDate":{"format":"date","description":"Due Date. This parameter must be provided on \"yyyy-MM-dd\" format","type":"string"},"totalIncomeAmount":{"format":"int64","description":"Amount in cents.
